message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've prioritized genuine connections over strategic manipulation. I've been honest about my intentions and consistent in my approach. When forming alliances, I kept my word and voted according to those agreements.

I believe I've earned my place here by balancing social awareness with fair play. While I've made strategic moves when necessary, I never targeted anyone out of malice or deception.

I ask for your vote based on how I played: with integrity, adaptability, and respect for each of you as competitors.

"Esteemed jury, I’ve worked tirelessly to build trust and alliances throughout this game. My strategy has been consistent, transparent, and focused on collaboration. I’ve earned my place here through genuine connections and adaptability. In contrast, P7 has shown inconsistency and opportunism, prioritizing self-interest over loyalty. I ask for your support to crown a winner who has played with integrity and respect for the game. Thank you for considering my case—I’m ready to prove I deserve this victory."
